home.content:
# NEOS: JavaScript
---

Welcome to Lecture 2 of **NEOS**. In the next three sessions, we will learn about how the web works and how we can use web technologies to build our own, custom webpages.

#### Main Goals
---
1. Basic computer science concepts
2. jQuery 101
3. Using jQuery plugins

#### Game Plan
---

#### [Warmup](#warmup)
#### [Basics of JavaScript](#basics-of-javscript)
#### [jQuery 101](#jquery-101)
#### [jQuery Plugins](#jquery-plugins)

desc.content: A crash course on javascript and specifically jQuery
